text: The trees are tall and thick. The wind is blowing lightly tall and thin looking figure stands with his back against tree. This is DURZA, an almost human-like person except for his maroon eyes and crimson hair. Durza closes his eyes and draws his sword up in front of face. The WIND blows again. Durza SNIFFS and then opens his eye

Spread out and hide! Stop whatever it is coming this way...or die! Suddenly, behind Durza, twelve URGALS, men-like creatures with bowed LEGS and ARMS. They also have two curved HORNS above their small ears. They begin to shuffle around. After a moment, each of the Urgals hide down beneath the bushes and behind the trees. Durza peers around the tree and looks up a small PATH tha goes through the forest. A GUST OF WIND blows across the forest. Durza sniffs, smiles, and then leans back against tree.

(Grunting) Get ready! An Urgal moves and a TWIG snaps. Durza hisses with rage. After a moment, three WHITE HORSES emerge from the darkne at the end of the path. Two MALE ELVES sit on the right and left horses, one FEMA ELF, ARYA, a beautiful black haired woman who looks to be her late twenties, is on the center horse. The three Elves draw closer to Durza. The WIND BLOWS towa the horses. They jump up on their back legs and then drop back down on all fours. The two male elves look frightened and then their horses start galloping. Arya's horse bolts forward and leaves th two male-elves behind. All of the Urgals jump from their hiding spots and draw Bows. They launch black ARROWS at the two male-elves, who fall their horses, dead. Durza jumps out from behind the tree and lifts his hand i the air.

Garjzla! A FIRE-BOLT launches from Durza's hand and hits Arya's ho which is a couple hundred feet away. Arya jumps off the horse and lightning speed and lands on ground lightly. Her horse falls down into the dirt beside her. Quickly, Arya gets up and bolts off of the path and into woods at inhuman speeds.

After her! All of the Urgals run after Arya. Durza looks all around. spots a large piece of GRANITE sticking up into the sky. climbs it. Once he gets to the top of the Granite piece, Durza looks over the treetops. He raises his hand up in the air.
Ilstari boetk! A quarter mile section of the forest explodes into flames Arya is running swiftly, the trees in front of her explod into flames. She quickly turns and runs in another direct
Ilstari boetk! Another quarter mile section of the forest burst into fla Arya turns and runs in another direction.

Ilstari boetk! A third quarter mile section of the forest burst into fla creating a ring of fire. Durza looks out over the large ring of fire. Suddenly, t sounds of screaming Urgals are heard. He looks down again. Three of the Urgals fall down to the ground, dead. Durza looks down at Arya, who is running toward him at a swift pace. The remaining Urgals are chasing her. Durza peeks over the edge twenty-foot high granite piece then jumps to the ground, right in front of Arya. Arya turns and runs in the other direction, but the Urgal surround her. She turns and looks for another way out, bu there is none. Durza points at Arya and smiles.

Get her! The Urgal's charge in. Arya pulls a pouch out of her pock and opens it up. She reaches inside and pulls out a beautiful SAPPHIRE STO and raises it above her head and quietly mumbles somethin the ANCIENT LANGUAGE. A flash of light comes from the sto Durza raises his hand toward Arya.

(Angry) Garjzla! A fire-bolt comes from his hand and hits Arya. She collap to the ground. Durza runs over to Arya and looks at her hands. The stone gone. Durza howls rage and throws his sword at a tree. It stick half way though. He then begins screaming. He raises his hand and shoots n bolts of fire at the remaining Urgal. They all drop dead instantly. He walks over to Arya and lifts her off the ground with e He throws her over his shoulder and then pulls his sword the tree. Durza walks back to his horse and gets on, putting Arya behind him. He puts the fire in front of him out and bolts off into darkness.

Large MOUNTAINS surround a small FIELD. ERAGON, an averag looking fifteen-year-old boy with dark eyebrows and brown eyes, kneels down and places his hand on a spot of trampl GRASS. After a moment, Eragon stands to his feet and begins to w toward a large FOREST that rest on the side of the mounta Eragon stops right at the edge of the forest and sighs. H pulls his BOW off of his back and knocks an ARROW. He wal into the forest.

After a few moments, Eragon comes to a quiet stop. He get down on his knees. A large HERD of DEER sit in a small opening in the forest DOE is limping around on the edge of the herd because of broken leg. Eragon smiles and pulls the arrow back. He aims for a mom and then... A huge flash of light blast out of the middle of the herd The deer jump up and run franticly. Eragon releases the arrow but it misses the deer. Eragon stands up. He has a surprised and confused look on his fa He walks over to where the light had come from. A ring of grass is burnt. The beautiful Sapphire Stone from before in the middle of the ring. Eragon hesitates in fear. After a moment, he grabs the st and examines it. It has little WHITE VEINS that run all o it like a Spiderweb. He drops his PACK off his back and onto the ground. He op it and carefully places the Stone inside. Eragon looks around and then stands to his feet. He walks of the small opening and back into the forest. Eragon fin large tree and throws a blanket out at the trunk of it.
The SUN peeks over the tops of the tall mountains. Eragon opens his eyes.
Eragon is walking down a small, dirt road. After a moment comes to the edge of a hill. Down at the bottom of the hill, maybe a mile away, rest CARVAHALL, a small village.
Eragon walks down the street of Carvahall. He stops and a building and enters.

A small BUTCHER is standing behind a counter toward the b of the room. He's cutting meat. This is SLOAN, a man in h early 40s. He has a constant angry look in his eyes. Eragon walks up to the counter. Sloan stops cutting the m and looks up.
(Sarcastic) So...the mighty hunter joins the rest of us! How many did you bag this time?
None.
I'm amazed! And that's why you've come? Well lets see your money, then!
I don't exactly have any, but I do-
(Angry) ; . So you want me to just give the meat to you?! (MORE)
SLOAN(cont 'd) Do you see any of the other Merchants giving away their wares? Besides, its late. I'm closed. You'll have to come back tomorrow with money.

I can't wait until tomorrow, Sloan. It'll be worth your while, though; I found something to pay you with. Eragon sets his pack down on the counter and pulls the Sapphire Stone out. He holds it in front of Sloan.
Stole it is more like it. Sloan goes back to chopping his meat.
I didn't steal it! I found it in the Spine when I was hunting! Sloan looks up in surprise at the mention of the Spine. H slams his KNIFE down onto the counter.
You get out of my store, boy! And take your cursed rock with you! Eragon doesn't move, but stands there in confusion.
Go before I make you! Suddenly, a tall, thick man walks into the building. This HORST, a rough looking man. Behind him is KATRINA, a beautiful young woman with long, blonde hair.
What's going on here, Sloan?
This...boy came in here badgering me. I asked him to leave, but he want budge. I even threatened him!
(To Eragon) Is this true?
No! I offered him this stone for payment and he agreed. when I told him that I got it from the Spine, he wouldn't sell it to me!
I have no love for the Spine myself, Sloan, but when it comes to the worth of the rock, I'll back it with my own money.
No. It's my store, I'll do what I want with it! Katrina steps out from behind Horst.
Daddy, Eragon is willing to pay. Just give him the meat so we can have dinner.
You stay out of this, Katrina! Go back to the house. Katrina doesn't movie.
Now! Katrina storms out of the door.
Fine! I'll pay for it. Eragon, what were you going to get?
As much as I could.
Give me your finest steaks. And make sure its enough to fill Eragon's pack. Sloan hesitates.
Not selling to me would be a very bad idea. Sloan scowls and then slips into a back room. The sounds CUTTING and WHACKING and slight mumbling is heard. Eragon looks up at Horst.
Thank you.
Oh...its really no trouble. Eragon holds the rock up to Horst
I guess this belongs to you.

(Chuckling) No..you keep your strange rock. As for payment, Albriech is leaving in the Spring to become a Master Smith. You can work off the debt over the spring. Sloan walks back into the room with a large sack of meat. sets it on the counter.
Eragon and Horst walk out of Sloan's store.
Oh, I forgot! Roran wanted me to get a message to Katrina, can you give it to her?
Of course.
He wants her to know that he'll come into town as soon as the merchants arrive and that he’1ll see her then.
That all?
(Embarrassed) No. He also wants her to know that she is the most beautiful girl he has ever seen and that he thinks of nothing else. Horst face breaks into a large grin. He winks at Eragon.
Getting serious, isn't he? Eragon smiles.
I better be getting back. Garrow's expecting me. Eragon begins to walk down the street. He waves farewell Horst after a moment.
Eragon's small WOODEN HOUSE sits in the middle of a large field. Eragon walks toward it slowly. A small flicker of light can be seen in the window of the house.

Eragon walks into the house with a dragging pace. He look very tired. He walks into the small KITCHEN and sets his pack on the TABLE. A small, pale man walks into the Kitchen. This is GARROW, hungry looking old man.
Where's Roran?
Sleeping. Eragon pulls the meat out of his pack and sets it on the table.
What's this? Did you buy meat? Where'd you get the money?  10.
Horst paid for it.
(Angry) ; I told you I won't accept charity Next they'll be asking if we need anything else! We may as well just move to town!
I didn't accept charity. Horst told me I could work it off at his forge this coming spring.
And where do you think you'll find time for that? Are you just going to ignore everything that needs to be done around here? There is a long silence.

I don't know how I'll do it. Besides, I found something that could be worth some money. Eragon reaches into his pack and pulls the Sapphire Stone and sets it on the table. Garrow bows over it. His face turns ravenous, and his han start to twitch.
You found this in the Spine?
Yes. It just appeared while I was hunting. Came out of no where. It scared all the deer off, too. Garrow looks over the Stone for a few more moments.
Anyway, its good to be home, uncle.
I'm glad your back. But you should get some rest. We're leaving early in the morning so we can get to the traders in time.  11.

Eragon walks into his room. He sets his pack down on the floor beside the wall and walks over to his bed. The Sapp Stone is in his hand. He looks at it for a moment and then places it under his and then goes to sleep.

The sun is just beginning to rise over the peaks of the Mountains that surround GARROW'S FARM. Smoke rises from t CHIMNEY on top of Eragon's house. Snow lies over the ground and in the tree's and on the to Eragon's house.

Eragon walks into the kitchen. He YAWNS and STRETCHES and then sits down at the table. Garrow is sitting at one end RORAN, a nine-teen year-old man. Each of them have a piec meat on their plate. Eragon begins to eat his food.
The snow that came last night might slow us down...
Still, we should be able to make it in time. After a moment, Garrow looks up from his plate and sighs.
Today is a...special day. Eragon and Roran look up from the plates and stop eating.

It was near this very hour, sixteen years ago, that Eragon's mother, Selena, showed up at my door...pregnant. She spent a few months with me then had you Eragon.  12. Eragon takes a bite of his meat and then looks back up at Garrow.
She begged me and Marian to raise you. When I asked why..."I must" was all she could say. Then she left. There is a long silence after Garrow's story.
So what's this I hear about a strange rock?
Come and see. Eragon and Roran both get up and walk out of the Kitchen.

Eragon comes through the door. Roran walks in behind Erag The Sapphire Stone is sitting under Eragon's bed, where h had left it. Eragon reaches under his bed and grabs the Stone. He holds it up for Roran to grab it. Roran hesitates for a moment and then takes the Stone fro Eragon.
It's beautiful...
We'd better leave now if we're going to catch the traders! Eragon grabs his pack of the ground and carefully puts th Sapphire Stone into it.

TENTS line the front of Carvahall. Hundreds of people wal around looking at various things. A WAGON, being pulled by horses, comes over a small hill rides down toward the group of tents. The wagon stops to the side of all the tents. Eragon and Roran jump off the wagon. Garrow slowly climbs down the s of the wagon.  13. Garrow puts his hands in his pocket and pulls out a few coins. He divides it up and then hands the coins to Erago and Roran.

Get yourselves some treats. Roran, do what you want, but be back at Horst house for dinner. Eragon come with me. Roran walks away and disappears into the crowd. Eragon an Garrow walk the opposite way. Eragon and Garrow walk up to a MAN who is standing behind table, showing off his KNIVES and SWORDS. This is MERLOCK rough looking merchant. After a moment, Merlock notices Eragon and Garrow. He the sets the sword down that he was holding and walks over to them.
And what would you fine sirs be looking for? Maybe a sword? Or maybe- He turns quickly and grabs a perfectly crafted SILVER ROS from the table. He holds it up in front of Eragon.
A silver rose for a special lady friend, eh?
Actually, we aren't looking to buy. We're looking to sell.
I see...do you have the item with you?
Yes, but we'd much rather show somewhere more...private.
Oh, I see...
Merlock comes through the entrance of the tent, Eragon an Garrow come in behind him.  14. Merlock picks up a stack of books off of two chairs and gestures toward them.
Please...have a seat. Eragon and Garrow sit down.

Show him the Stone, Eragon. Eragon hesitates but then pulls the Stone out of the pack hands it to Merlock. Merlock looks at it with an interested eye. He pulls a bo out and opens it. He takes a small hammer and starts to t it and do other various things to it. After a few moments stops.
Do you know how much this is worth?
No...
Unfortunately, neither do I. But I will tell you this much: it's unlike anything I've ever seen. It won't scratch. Whoever made it used tools I've never seen-or maybe magic. And it’s hallow.
What?!
Have you ever heard a rock that sounds like this? Merlock gets the small hammer and taps the rock. It echo' slightly.
But what is it worth!?
I can't tell you that. For most people, this would be an item of curiosity-not an item to spend money on. Everything is silent for a few moments.  15.
Will you buy it?

No...it’s not worth the risk. I may be able to find a wealthy buyer during my spring travels, but even so, you'll have to wait until next year before you'll get paid. (Beat ) I am curious however...why did you want to speak to me in private?
Because, I found this in the Spine. People around here don't care to much for the place.
Do you know why me and my fellow traders were late this year? Eragon shakes his head.

Our wanderings have been dogged with misfortune. Chaos seems to rule Alagaseia. We can't seem to avoid illness, attacks, and the worse black luck. Because the Varden's attacks against the Empire, Galbatorix is calling more men to the border. Men who are needed to fight the Urgals. Merlock stops and picks up and drinks a CUP of WATER.
And even worst, there's talk of a Shade, though the stories are unconfirmed. Not many people survive such an encounter.
Why haven't we heard of this?
Because, these things have just happened in the past few months.
Nonsense! We haven't seen any Urgals. (MORE)
GARROW(cont 'd) The only one around here has his horns hooked to the wall in Morn's tavern!

Maybe so...but this is a small village that's hidden by mountains. No surprise that you haven't been noticed yet. But if you haven't noticed, strange things are happening, especially after the appearing of that rock appearing!
Garrow is walking swiftly through the thick crowd toward entrance to Carvahall. Eragon is walking behind him, tryi to keep up.
What do you think?
I think I'm going to get more information.

Horst, Eragon, Garrow, Roran, and various other people si around a large, wooden table. Everyone is laughing and ea and drinking. MORN, a rough looking man, leans forward with a dark look his eye. Everyone gets quiet.

There's strange people around here. Grain buyers who cheat everyone out of their money. (Breat) They're telling ridiculous stories about how the Varden had made a pact with the Urgals and planned to attack us. And how it was only for the great King Galbatorix that we haven't already be over taken by their armies.
If they keep it up, there's gonna be trouble.  17.
For who?
For them.

Hundreds of people gather around a huge BONFIRE. Eragon Garrow, and Roran walks up to the group of people. A DARK FIGURE, BROM, an older man with a large beard and bushy eye brows, stands right beside the BONFIRE. Everyon looking at him.

Before your grandfathers fathers were born, and even before their fathers were born, the Dragon Riders were formed. To protect and guard was their mission. And for thousands of years, they succeeded. Their prowess in battle was unmatched. Each of the Riders had the strength of ten men. The crowd is now completely quiet. Only the sound of Brom of the BONFIRE.

They were immortal. Only for good were their powers used. And as they kept the peace, the land flourished. It was a golden time. The Elves were our allies, the Dwarves our friends. But it could not last. Though no enemy could defeat them, they could not guard against themselves. (Beat ) And it came to pass, that in the golden age of Alagaesia, Galbatorix was born.
GALBATORIX (10) is fighting, with a sword, a RIDER. After moment, Galbatorix hit's the Rider's sword out of the his hands.  18.
At the age of ten, he was tested, and the Riders found great power in him. The riders accepted him as their own.
Galbatorix, now 17, is flying through the air on the back a large BLACK DRAGON. On the ground below him there is a group of Urgals. The Black Dragon dives toward the group.

After his training was complete, he took a reckless trip with two friends into the remaining territory of the Urgals. Galbatorix is slaughtering the Urgals with his sword. The Black Dragon is overtaken by Urgals and is falls to the ground, dead.
He killed his attackers, but tragically, his dragon was killed in the battle. And thus the seeds of madness were planted.
Galbatorix is wandering through a large grass plain. Afte moment, he falls down to the ground, unconscious.

For months, he wandered, seeking death, but it did not come. He was found and summoned to the Riders to be judged. He demanded another dragon, but the desperation in his voice revealed before the Council what he truly was.
Brom is standing in front of the fire, looking around at crowd.  19.

Denied his hope, Galbatorix, through the twisted mirror of madness, came to believe that it was the Riders fault that his dragon had been killed. And so, night after night, he brooded on this, and planned his exact...revenge... (Beat ) Through some ill fortune, he met a Rider named Morzan. Morzan was strong in body, but weak in mind. (Beat ) They slaughtered every Rider they came in contact with. With each kill, their strength grew. Twelve of the Riders joined them because of the desire for power. After this, Galbatorix named himself King over Alagasesia. He's ruled us ever since.
Eragon and Roran are sitting in the back of the WAGON, Ga is in the front, controlling the horses. Eragon sits stil He looks as if he is in deep thought.
You two are very lucky to have heard that story. He's only told it twice, and if the Empire knew he had, he wouldn't live to see another month.

A small candle on Eragon's DRESSER lights the room. He pu the Sapphire Stone out of his pack and sets it own his be He pulls out a small, wooden HAMMER and taps it. After a moments of tapping it in different places, he shakes his head, sets the Stone on his dresser, and climbs into his Quickly, his eyes close and he falls asleep. DARKNESS... A loud SQUEAK is heard.  20. A candle is lit and Eragon's room comes into view. Eragon holding it. He sets the candle down on his dresser and lo around. The SQUEAK is heard again. It's coming from the Sapphire Stone. Eragon turns around and looks at it.

(Whispering) I've got nothing but trouble ever since I found you...and now you won't even let me sleep! Eragon gets back in his bed and closes his eyes. The Ston SQUEAKS again. And it begins to ROCK. Eragon sits up in h bed and scowls.

(Whispering) I don't care how valuable you are! I'm gonna destroy you! CRACKS begin to appear on the Stone. Eragon stands still, looks at it. Entranced. More CRACKS appear, and run strai to the top of the Stone. After a moment, a small piece at the top of the Stone bre away from the rest, and falls to the floor. A small HEAD appears pokes out of the hole in the top of Stone! Eragon steps back from the stone. After a moment, a shado body is standing beside the stone. Eragon looks shocked. It's a baby DRAGON! It's no longer Eragon's forearm, and its SCALES are deep SAPPHIRE BLUE. After a moment, the dragon begins look around and walk ar the dresser. Eragon reaches out with his hand and touches it on the ba A blue FLASH comes from the dragon and launches Eragon ba onto the floor. Eragon lets out a scream. After a second, Eragon gets up the floor and listens to make sure no one is coming. Eragon's hand turns red. He begins to scratch it, but sto and looks at his palm in fear. A large blue OVAL appears the skin of his palm. A few moments later a COLLAGE of VOICES can be heard. Era puts his hands on his head and closes his eyes.  21. A few seconds later he throws his hands down. The voices stop. Eragon is out of breath. Eragon quietly walks out of his room and closes the door.
Eragon opens a large box and pulls out a long strip of ME He walks back toward his room.

Eragon walks into the room and quietly closes the door. H takes the strip of meat and sets it beside the dragon. Th dragon sniffs it at first and then starts to eat it. Eragon smiles. After a moment, the dragon lay's down on i back and falls asleep. Eragon waits a moment, and then ge picks the dragon up and takes it over to his bed. He sets down and then climbs onto his bed and lay's down beside i
What am I going to do with you...?
The sun is peeking over the tree tops. Eragon runs down t dirt road. He's holding the dragon. After a moment, he wa off the path and into the FOREST.
Eragon walks deep into the forest. After a moment, he sto at a large, snow covered TREE. Eragon puts a small, leath blanket over the dragon and sets it up on one of the limb
Welcome home...for now...I don't know what I'm going to do with you. Eragon takes a small rope and ties it to the dragons leg. then takes the other end of the rope and ties the dragon the tree.
Don't go trying to get away...I don't know what the others would do to you if they were to find you. But I don't want to find out.
Eragon knocks on Brom's large, wooden, door. behind Eragon.
What do you want, boy? Eragon turns around, frightened.
I...wanted to ask you a few questions.
Well, you'd better come inside, then; we'll be talking a while. Your questions never seem to end.

Brom pours two cups of tea. He walks over to and hands Eragon one of the cups. 22. Brom walks up the fire place Eragon is sitting in a small rocking chair. Brom sits dow another rocking chair across from Eragon. Old BOOKS and SCROLLS are stacked up all over the room. Brom pulls a SMOKING PIPE up to his lips and candle that is beside him.
Ah...here we go. (Beat ) Now...what do you want?

Well, I've heard a lot about the Dragon Riders and their great accomplishments, and most everyone wants them to return. But I've never heard any stories about how they were started and what made them so special.
A vast subject to tell about. If I were to tell you the whole story we'd still be sitting here next winter. lights it witha  23. Brom sucks on his pipe and lets out a smoke ring.
I'll start with the last item...Dragons. Eragon settles back in his chair and sips his tea.

Dragons have no beginning, unless it lies with the creation of Alagaseia itself. And if they have an end, it will be when this land perishes. Dragon's can communicate with their Riders, also. The dragons, dwarves, and a few other creatures are true inhabitants of this land. Their world was unchanging until the first elves sailed here in their silver ships.
Where did the elves come from?
(Scowling) Did you want your first question answered or not?!
(Embarrassed) Sorry. Brom chuckles under his breath.
No, your not. (Beat ) If you must know, the elves come from a place they call Alalea. No one knows what, or even where it is. Brom sucks on his pipe again and lets out another smoke r
In fact, you were named after an elf. The first Dragon Rider, to be specific. Eragon sits up - his eyes wide open.  24.
Ah...so you didn't know your namesake?
No. Eragon looks confused. Brom stands up and walks out of the room with his tea cup After a moment, he returns with a full cup of tea. He sit down on his chair and takes a sip of tea.
Do you remember any of the dragon names?
Hmm...lets see...there was Jura, Hirador, and Fundor-who fought the giant sea snake. Galzra, Briam, Ohen...umm...Beroan... Brom stops for a moment and lets a large smoke ring float into the air.
(Whispering) And Saphira... Eragon sits back for a moment. He then sets his tea cup d on a small TABLE that is beside him and then stands up.
Well, it's getting late and I should get back...
(Curious) Eragon? Why the sudden interest in Dragons and such?
Umm...I heard a couple of...traders talking about it.
Oh.

Eragon walks through the front door of into the kitchen. Garrow and Roran are table. They each have a plate of food. empty seat. A plate of food is already For a few moments everything is silent Garrow for a moment and then back down
(To Roran) What's wrong, Roran?

Nothings wrong. Its just that...well, I was at Horst' 25. the house and goes already sitting at the Eragon sits down at an fixed for him. Roran looks up at at his plate. today to pick up a few things and a stranger was there from Therinsford.
What's his name?
Dempton.
Oh.
Anyway, he owns a Mill. He was here to get some sockets made for a piece of machinery.
So?
He offered me a job at the Mill. If I accept, I'll leave with him when he returns for the sockets.. to take the job. .I plan A few moments of silence pass. Garrow leans back in his chair.
Why?  26.
Well...I plan to marry Katrina, and I can't do that without any money.
I see. A few more moments of silence pass.
Well, when do you leave?
What?!
Did you think I'd stop him? It's life's natural course. (Beat ) When do you leave?
About two weeks.

Eragon is walking through the forest until he comes to th TREE that he had left the dragon in. The dragon is sitting right where Eragon left it. It is s tied to the tree. Eragon takes the rope off of the dragon and pulls it out the tree. ground. He looks at it for a second and then sets it on the
Eragon.
You need a name...I heard a few today; Maybe you'll like one. Let's see...there was Vanilor, Eridor-
No... The dragon looks amused.  27.
Umm...there was Ingothold...wait a second! Your not a he...your a she, aren't you. The dragon sets its head down on the ground.
Well, lets see then...I don't remember any na--wait--are you...Saphira?
Yes...
The sun is rising above the trees. Snow covers the ground Eragon, Roran, and Garrow are standing on the front porch
Eragon and Roran have packs on. Garrow is standing by the door with a sad look on his face.
Won't you come with us?
No...no...I have...things to do. Garrow holds out his hand and places money into Roran's h Roran smiles.
It isn't much, but that and a fathers blessing is all I have to give. Roran embraces Garrow for a moment and then turns and wal off the porch. Eragon follows him.
Eragon and Roran are walking down the street. They come t the SMITHY and walk inside.  28.
Eragon and Roran come through the door and stop. DEMPTON Horst are standing side by side in front of the counter. Eragon and Roran walk over to them.
(To Roran) Are you ready? Roran adjust's his pack.
Yes. Do we leave soon?
I've got a few things to take care of, but we'll be gone within the hour. Dempton walks over to Eragon.
You must be Eragon. I would offer you a job, but Roran got the only one. (Beat ) Maybe in a year or two, eh? Horst walks over to Dempton and hands him a bag full of SOCKETS.
They're ready. Horst and Dempton shake hands. Horst walks out of the Smi motioning for Eragon to fallow.
Horst walks out of the door and stands on the side of the dirt street. A moment later, Eragon comes out and stands beside Horst.
What do you think of him?
He's a good man. I wouldn't worry. Horst wipes his hand over his face.  Eragon Eragon Eragon Eragon 29.
Do you remember the fight you had with Sloan?
If you're asking about payment for the meat, I haven't forgotten.
No, no...I trust you. What I was wondering about is if you still had that blue stone? looks confused and worried.
I do, but why do you ask?
